title: Trailblazer League/Tasks/Kharidian Desert

properties.name: description
properties.value: Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

content:
Contents

  • 1 Easy
  • 2 Medium
  • 3 Hard
  • 4 Elite
  • 5 Master

Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

With 15 tasks available, there are a total of 150 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete Room 1 of Pyramid Plunder Search the Golden Chest in Room 1 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem. 21 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Complete Room 2 of Pyramid Plunder Search the Golden Chest in Room 2 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem. 31 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Pick a Winter Sq'irk Pick a Winter Sq'irk in the Sorceress's Garden. N/A Completion of Prince Ali Rescue
Turn in a Winter Sq'irkjuice to Osman Turn in a Winter Sq'irkjuice to Osman in Al Kharid. N/A Completion of Prince Ali Rescue
Complete the Al Kharid Agility Course Complete a lap of the Al Kharid Rooftop Agility Course. 20 Agility N/A
Craft a Fire Rune Craft a Fire Rune at the Fire Altar. 14 Runecraft N/A
Defeat an Al Kharid Warrior[sic] Defeat an Al Kharid Warrior[sic]. N/A N/A
Complete the Easy Desert Diary Complete all of the easy tasks in the Desert Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Go Through the Al Kharid Gate Go through the Al Kharid gate. N/A 10 Coins or completion of Prince Ali Rescue
Tan a Cow Hide in the Kharidian Desert Tan a cow hide in the Kharidian Desert. N/A 1 Coin
Use the Bank in Nardah Use the bank in Nardah. N/A N/A
Cut a Cactus in the Kharidian Desert Cut a Cactus in the Kharidian Desert. N/A A knife or a slash weapon
Take a Carpet Ride from Pollnivneach to Sophanem Take a carpet ride from Pollnivneach to Sophanem. N/A Up to 400 Coins from Shantay Pass / 200 Coins from Pollnivneach in carpet ride costs, or none with Desert hard diary
Enter the Kalphite Lair Enter the Kalphite Lair. N/A Rope or Desert hard diary completion
Complete The Golem Complete The Golem quest. 20 Crafting, 25 Thieving N/A

Medium[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 50 league points upon completion.

With 24 tasks available, there are a total of 1,200 league points that can be earned from medium tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete Room 3 of Pyramid Plunder Search the Golden Chest in Room 3 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem. 41 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Complete Room 4 of Pyramid Plunder Search the Golden Chest in Room 4 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem. 51 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Complete Room 5 of Pyramid Plunder Search the Golden Chest in Room 5 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem. 61 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Pick a Spring Sq'irk Pick a Spring Sq'irk in the Sorceress's Garden. N/A Completion of Prince Ali Rescue ( 25 Thieving to enter Spring Garden)
Pick a[sic] Autumn Sq'irk Pick a[sic] Autumn Sq'irk in the Sorceress's Garden. N/A Completion of Prince Ali Rescue ( 45 Thieving to enter Autumn Garden)
Turn in 10 Spring Sq'irkjuices to Osman Turn in 10 Spring sq'irkjuices to Osman in Al Kharid in one go. N/A Completion of Prince Ali Rescue ( 25 Thieving to enter Spring Garden)
Pickpocket a Bandit in the Bandit Camp Pickpocket a Bandit in the Kharidian Desert's Bandit Camp. 53 Thieving N/A
Smith 1000 Mithril Dart Tips Use an Anvil to smith 1000 Mithril Dart Tips. 54 Smithing Completion of The Tourist Trap (automatically completed)
Make a Combat Potion Make a Combat Potion. 36 Herblore A pestle and mortar or 50 Coins for Wesley
Defeat a Crocodile Defeat a Crocodile in the Kharidian Desert. N/A N/A
Turn in a Pyramid Top to Simon Templeton Turn in a Pyramid top to Simon Templeton at the Agility Pyramid. 30 Agility N/A
Craft a Lava Rune at the Fire Altar Craft a Lava Rune at the Fire Altar. 23 Runecraft N/A
Catch 30 Orange Salamanders Catch 30 Orange Salamanders at Uzer. 47 Hunter A rope and small fishing net
Mine 30 Chunks of Granite Mine 30 chunks of Granite at the Kharidian Desert Quarry. 45 Mining A pickaxe
Defeat a Scarab Mage Defeat a Scarab Mage in the Sophanem Dungeon. N/A Partial completion of Contact!, a light source
Defeat a Kalphite Guardian Defeat a Kalphite Guardian in the Kharidian Desert. N/A N/A
Move Your House to Pollnivneach Move your Player Owned House to Pollnivneach. 20 Construction N/A
Cast Ice Rush Cast the Ice Rush spell. 58 Magic Completion of Desert Treasure (automatically completed)
Complete the Medium Desert Diary Complete all of the medium tasks in the Desert Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Cast Bones to Peaches Cast the Bones to Peaches spell. 60 Magic Participation in Mage Training Arena to purchase. Bones (animals' bones will not complete the task).
Complete Spirits of the Elid Complete the Spirits of the Elid quest. 33 , 37 , 37 , 37 N/A
Pray at the Elidinis Statuette Pray at the Elidinis Statuette in Nardah. N/A Completion of Spirits of the Elid
Enter Sophanem Enter Sophanem. N/A Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Complete Shadow of the Storm Complete the Shadow of the Storm quest. 30 Crafting N/A

Hard[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 100 league points upon completion.

With 20 tasks available, there are a total of 2,000 league points that can be earned from hard tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete Room 6 of Pyramid Plunder Search the Golden Chest in Room 6 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem. 71 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Complete Room 7 of Pyramid Plunder Search the Golden Chest in Room 7 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem. 81 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Pick a Summer Sq'irk Pick a Summer Sq'irk in the Sorceress's Garden. N/A Completion of Prince Ali Rescue ( 65 Thieving to enter Summer Garden)
Turn in 25 Autumn Sq'irkjuices to Osman Turn in 25 Autumn sq'irkjuices to Osman in Al Kharid in one go. N/A Completion of Prince Ali Rescue ( 45 Thieving to enter Autumn Garden)
Pickpocket a Menaphite Thug 50 Times Knock out and then pickpocket a Menaphite Thug 50 times. 65 Thieving The Feud or Rogue Trader to acquire a blackjack
Make 20 Magic Potions Make 20 Magic Potions. 76 Herblore N/A
Smith 1000 Adamant Dart Tips Use an Anvil to smith 1000 Adamant Dart Tips. 74 Smithing Completion of The Tourist Trap (automatically completed)
Check a grown Cactus Check the health of a Cactus you've grown in Al Kharid. 55 Farming Cactus seed or Potato cactus seed
Check a grown Potato Cactus Check the health of a Potato Cactus you've grown in Al Kharid. 64 Farming Potato cactus seed
Defeat a Dust Devil in the Kharidian Desert Defeat a Dust Devil in the Kharidian Desert. 65 Slayer Face mask or Slayer helmet, partial completion of Desert Treasure (automatically completed)
Cast Ice Burst Cast the Ice Burst spell. 70 Magic Completion of Desert Treasure (automatically completed)
Cast Ice Blitz Cast the Ice Blitz spell. 82 Magic Completion of Desert Treasure (automatically completed)
Cast Smoke Barrage Cast the Smoke Barrage spell. 86 Magic Completion of Desert Treasure (automatically completed)
Cast Shadow Barrage Cast the Shadow Barrage spell. 88 Magic Completion of Desert Treasure (automatically completed)
Equip a Dragon 2H Sword Equip a Dragon 2h sword in the Kharidian Desert. 60 Attack N/A
Complete the Hard Desert Diary Complete all of the hard tasks in the Desert Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Equip a Piece of the Infinity Robe Set Equip any piece of the Infinity robe set. 50 Magic, 25 Defence N/A
Complete Enakhra's Lament Complete the Enakhra's Lament quest. 50 , 45 , 43 , 39 N/A
Cast Paddewwa Teleport Cast the Paddewwa Teleport spell. 54 Magic Completion of Desert Treasure (automatically completed)
Have Zahur Make 1,000 Unfinished Potions At Once Have Zahur make 1,000 Unfinished Potions in one go. N/A Desert hard diary or Herblore cape, 200,000 Coins

Elite[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 250 league points upon completion.

With 18 tasks available, there are a total of 4,500 league points that can be earned from elite tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete Room 8 of Pyramid Plunder Search the Golden Chest in Room 8 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem. 91 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Complete Room 8 of Pyramid Plunder 50 Times Search the Golden Chest in Room 8 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem 50 times. 91 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Complete Room 8 of Pyramid Plunder 100 Times Search the Golden Chest in Room 8 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem 100 times. 91 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Complete Room 8 of Pyramid Plunder 250 Times Search the Golden Chest in Room 8 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem 250 times. 91 Thieving (not boostable) Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper (automatically completed)
Turn in 100 Summer Sq'irkjuices to Osman Turn in 100 Summer sq'irkjuices to Osman in Al Kharid. N/A Completion of Prince Ali Rescue ( 65 Thieving to enter Summer Garden)
Smith 1000 Rune Dart Tips Use an Anvil to smith 1000 Rune Dart Tips. 89 Smithing Completion of The Tourist Trap (automatically completed)
Defeat the Kalphite Queen Defeat the Kalphite Queen in the Kalphite Lair. N/A Two ropes
Equip a Dragon Chainbody in the Kharidian Desert Equip a Dragon chainbody in the Kharidian Desert. 60 Defence N/A
Cast Blood Barrage Cast the Blood Barrage spell. 92 Magic Completion of Desert Treasure (automatically completed)
Cast Ice Barrage Cast the Ice Barrage spell. 94 Magic Completion of Desert Treasure (automatically completed)
Defeat the Kalphite Queen 100 Times Defeat the Kalphite Queen in the Kalphite Lair 100 times. N/A Two ropes or Desert hard diary
Defeat the Kalphite Queen 250 Times Defeat the Kalphite Queen in the Kalphite Lair 250 times. N/A Two ropes or Desert hard diary
Defeat the Kalphite Queen 500 Times Defeat the Kalphite Queen in the Kalphite Lair 500 times. N/A Two ropes or Desert hard diary
Complete the Elite Desert Diary Complete all of the elite tasks in the Desert Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Equip a Full Infinity Robe Set Equip a full set of Infinity robes. 50 Magic, 25 Defence N/A
Equip a Master Wand Equip a Master Wand. 60 Magic N/A
Craft a Ghorrock Teleport Tablet Craft a Ghorrock Teleport Tablet. 96 Completion of Desert Treasure (automatically completed)
Equip a Mage's Book Equip a Mage's Book. 60 Magic N/A

Master[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 500 league points upon completion.

However, there are no master tasks for the Kharidian Desert.
